title: Matthew Taylor – 2001 Speech to Liberal Democrat Party Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Matthew Taylor to the Liberal Democrat Party Conference held in Bournemouth on 25 September 2001.
content:
Before the appalling events in America, the row between the Prime Minister and the TUC (and many Labour backbenchers) over the Private Finance Initiative looked set to dominate the news.
